title: North Las Vegas police searching for man accused of putting cameras in bathrooms
content:
North Las Vegas, NV (KTNV) -- Detectives need help identifying a man who placed a hidden camera in a bathroom of a business. 

On Aug. 20, officers responded to a business in the 1900 block of West Craig Road regarding a hidden camera that was found in a public restroom. An employee located the camera and notified law enforcement of the discovery. 

North Las Vegas police reported that video evidence suggests the suspect entered the store and placed the camera in the bathroom while no one was looking. 

The suspect is described as a Hispanic man around 30 years old, about 5’07” and 190 pounds. He was last seen wearing black glasses, a gray polo shirt, light colored pants and black sandals.

Anyone with more information is asked to call the North Las Vegas Police Department at 702-633-9111 or Crime Stoppers at 702-385-5555.
